item.title: What is this weird compile error? picture inside
item.dc:creator: @musicmad441 Musicmad
item.description:
@musicmad441 wrote:

I just added a npc speech command, this is what I added:

} if (npcs[i].npcType == 3097) { // White Knight - White Owner if (misc.random2(1) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Welcome to PkMad Scape!"; } if (npcs[i].npcType == 2994) { // barrow entrance //bit I added if (misc.random2(1) == 1) { //bit I added npcs[i].updateRequired = true; //bit I added npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; //bit I added npcs[i].textUpdate = "you will need a dramen staff to enter!"; //bit I added } if (npcs[i].npcType == 3118) { // White Knight - White Owner if (misc.random2(1) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Welcome to mod city!"; } }

It is like the same to all the others, this is the compile error I got:

does anyone no my problem, please help

Many Thanks James

Read full topic
